admin-audit.title: Registration Audit
admin-audit.approve-confirm: Are you sure you want to approve user {name}?
admin-audit.ban-confirm: Are you sure you want to ban user {name}? Once banned, the user will not be able to log in, and the audit record will be removed.

messages.copy-success-detail: Audit code has been copied to clipboard

modals.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}? This action is irreversible, and all user data will be permanently removed.
modals.ban-confirmation: Are you sure you want to ban user {username}? Once banned, the user will not be able to log in.
modals.reset2fa-confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset 2FA for user {username}? This will disable all 2FA methods (including email and authenticator).
modals.pardon-confirmation: Are you sure you want to pardon user {username}?
modals.reset-password-warning: This will force reset the user's login password.

delete-modal.title: Delete Notice
delete-modal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete notice {title}? This action is irreversible.

detail.title: Notice Detail
detail.not-found: Notice does not exist or has been deleted

messages.validation-error: Please fill in title and content

notice-management.title: Notice Management
notice-management.desc: Publish, edit or delete system notices

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Please login to your account
login.register-link: Don't have an account? Register now
login.login-failed-detail: Please check your username and password

two-factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two-factor.email-subtitle: Please enter the code sent to {email}
two-factor.app-subtitle: Please enter the code from Authenticator App

forgot-password.title: Reset Password
forgot-password.subtitle: Please enter your email to receive a verification code
forgot-password.reset-success-message: Password has been reset, please login with your new password.
forgot-password.check-code-message: Please check if the verification code is correct

register.title: Create New Account
register.subtitle: Join Shigure Cafe, start your journey
register.audit-code-label: Your account requires audit. Please save your audit code:
register.audit-code-hint: Please send this code to an administrator to activate your account. Unaudited accounts cannot log in.
register.already-have-account: Already have an account? Back to login

messages.copy-success-detail: Audit code has been copied to clipboard
messages.invalid-username: Username must be 3-50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
messages.check-info: Please check the information you filled in

basic-info.title: Basic Profile
basic-info.subtitle: Your personal account details and status.

minecraft.title: Minecraft Binding
minecraft.subtitle: Bind your Minecraft account to enjoy more features in-game.
minecraft.sync-info: Your game attributes will be synchronized after binding

messages.refresh-success-detail: Your Minecraft character name has been updated.
messages.update-nickname-detail: Your nickname has been updated successfully.
messages.avatar-update-detail: Your avatar has been successfully uploaded and updated.
messages.system-busy: System busy, please try again later
messages.bind-success-detail: Your Minecraft account has been bound successfully.
messages.bind-failed-reason: Possible reasons: Minecraft not purchased on Microsoft account or authorization timeout

password.title: Change Password
password.subtitle: For your account security, it is recommended to change your password regularly.

email.title: Email Management
email.subtitle: Manage your bound email for password recovery and security notifications.

email-2fa.title: Email 2FA
email-2fa.subtitle: Once enabled, a verification code sent to your email will be required during login.
email-2fa.modal-desc: A verification code has been sent to your email: {email}. Please enter the 6-digit dynamic code:

totp.title: Authenticator (TOTP)
totp.subtitle: Once enabled, a code generated by an authenticator app will be required during login.
totp.step1: 1. Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator):
totp.manual-tip: Can't scan the QR code? You can manually enter the secret:
totp.step2: 2. Please enter the code generated by your authenticator app to confirm:

messages.password-mismatch: The two new passwords entered do not match
messages.password-success-detail: Your password has been successfully updated. Please use the new password for your next login.
messages.password-failed-detail: Incorrect old password or system error
messages.verify-failed-detail: Incorrect verification code, please try again
messages.email-update-detail: Your email has been successfully updated.
messages.email-update-failed-detail: Please check if your verification code is correct

messages.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
messages.send-success-detail: Verification code has been sent to your email, please check your inbox.
messages.request-failed: Request failed, please try again later

errors.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Account is disabled or pending audit
errors.ACCOUNT_PENDING: Account is pending audit, please wait
errors.ACCOUNT_BANNED: Account has been banned, please contact administrator
errors.UNAUTHORIZED: Please login to your account first
errors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action
errors.SELF_DELETION_PROTECTED: You cannot delete your own account
errors.VERIFICATION_CODE_NOT_FOUND: Verification code not found or expired
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large, please upload an image within 2MB
errors.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Unsupported file type, please upload an image file
errors.FILE_UPLOAD_FAILED: File upload failed, please try again later
errors.XBOX_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: Valid Xbox profile not found, please create one on Xbox website first
errors.XBOX_CHILD_ACCOUNT_RESTRICTION: Your account is restricted by child protection and cannot be bound
errors.MINECRAFT_AUTH_FAILED: Minecraft authentication failed, please ensure you have purchased the game
errors.MINECRAFT_APP_REGISTRATION_INVALID: Invalid Minecraft service configuration (app registration incomplete), please contact administrator
errors.MINECRAFT_PROFILE_FAILED: Failed to fetch Minecraft profile, please ensure you have purchased the game and set up a character
errors.MINECRAFT_PROFILE_NOT_FOUND: Minecraft character not found, please ensure you have purchased the game and set up a name
errors.MINECRAFT_ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED: Your Minecraft account has been banned or suspended
errors.MICROSOFT_INVALID_GRANT: Microsoft authorization code invalid or expired, please login again
errors.XBOX_NOT_AVAILABLE_IN_COUNTRY: Xbox Live is not available in your region
errors.XSTS_AUTH_FAILED: Failed to get Xbox security token
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED_RETRY: Too many requests, please try again in {retryAfter} seconds
